Question
========

Given are the following sample outcomes: 28, 23, 17, 30, 28, 21. A one-sample T-test to test H~0~:μ = 20 with α = 5% two-sided risk, gives as the value of the test size and corresponding conclusion:

Answerlist
----------

* T = 0.90, do not reject H0
* T = 2.01, do not reject H0
* T = 2.20, reject H0
* T = 2.20, do not reject H0

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* T = 0.90, do not reject H0: Incorrect
* T = 2.01, do not reject H0: Incorrect
* T = 2.20, reject H0: Incorrect
* T = 2.20, do not reject H0: Correct
